name: joshburt-website
description: Static website for joshburt.com.au with Netlify Functions and Neon DB integration

scripts.dev:all: echo Run 'npm run dev' in one terminal and 'npm run dev:functions' in another for full stack development
scripts.test:functions: echo Running functions:auth_me_smoke && node tests/functions/auth_me_smoke.test.js && echo Running functions:orders_products_smoke && node tests/functions/orders_products_smoke.test.js && echo Running functions:auth_errors && node tests/functions/auth_errors.test.js && echo Running functions:handlers && node tests/functions/handlers.test.js
scripts.test:all: echo Running Jest suite && npm run test:jest && echo Running Node smoke tests && npm run test:functions
scripts.lint: echo Linting JS && npm run lint:js && echo Linting HTML && npm run lint:html
scripts.validate: echo Lint + Build + Tests start && npm run lint && echo Build CSS && npm run build:css && echo Run tests && npm run test:all
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m 'chore: bump version to %s'
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m 'feat: bump version to %s'
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m 'feat!: bump version to %s (breaking changes)'

author: Josh Burt
